Description:
A Fortune 500 client is hiring a Profit Analysis & Consultancy Consultant. Based in Riyadh you will provide the consultancy and the right tools for operations leads to improve the restaurant's profitability.Review the monthly detailed P&L and Management Reports to identify the store-wise performance opportunities for the profit consultancy.
Present the identified opportunities to the operations leads (Operations Manager, Operations Consultant & Store Manager) and discuss & agree on the action plans to improve restaurant profitability.
Continuous follow-up on the status of the already agreed action plans.
Assist Manager, PAC on action planning on loss-maker stores to improve profitability.
Assist Manager PAC in the benchmarking process to establish internal standards for the loss-maker stores.
Carry out continuous P&L workshops.
Provide monthly P&L Clarification to the Operations Leads.
Assist PAC Manager in reviewing and evaluating the functional processes of the various departments to enhance process efficiency and cost savings.
Provide timely, relevant, and accurate reporting & analysis of the results of the operational performance against historical & approved budget to facilitate the profitable decision making
Proactively take responsibility for self-improvement and develop expertise through off-the-job training activities and involvement in more complex tasks and projectsSkills
Skills:
Minimum 3 years of experience in a similar role specializing in Performance Analysis and Consultancy.
CIMA (UK) /CPA.
Management Skills.
Analytical Skills.
Problem Solving Skills.
Communication Skills.
Presentation Skills.
Computer Literacy (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
Detail Orientated.
